Detailed Description

staggered fermionic field

Example: 

/// staggered_field psi(lattice,nc);
/// mdp_site x(lattice);
/// forallsites(x)
///   for(int i=0; i<nc; i++)
///     psi(x,i)=0.0+0.0*I;
///
